revised_title: Forbidden Lines Excitation in Gaseous Nebulae: Calculations for 3p
tldr: The authors conducted calculations for the excitation of forbidden lines in gaseous nebulae, focusing on ions with configurations to 5. They used the Hartree-Fock method to calculate ion wavefunctions and employed two approximations for the collision problem. The results provide insights into the behavior of spectral lines and contribute to the understanding of gaseous nebulae.
